channel.title: Help me with commands :)
channel.description:
Hey.. Can some1 make me the code ''Master'' ( All 99 NO NON COMBAT SKILLS. ) And 1 with ''Pure'' ( 70 Attack 99 Strenght 94Mage 99Hp )
Zomg!! Tyvm then, +rep if i can

item.title: Help me with commands :)
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

o.O you can’t rep for one and two, i don’t think your allowed to post rewards. not sure gimme a min and ill help you with those commands though[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2007, 07:02:40 AM[/size][hr]Master:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1-3) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); sendMessage("you are now a master "+playerName+""); }
Pure:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffpure") && (playerRights >= 1)) { addSkillXP(994000000, 0); addSkillXP(994000000, 2); addSkillXP(994000000, 3); addSkillXP(994000000, 4); addSkillXP(994000000, 6); sendMessage("your message"); }

Read full topic
